name: ts-for-gir-gtk-3-webkit-example
description: Simple Gjs Gtk 3 example app to demonstrate how you can use WebKit2

scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:app
scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run start:app
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
